activities.description: to store static prefix filename for each and every jira's rest api

dependsOn.activity: Set 8 to store 1st part of blob restapi

activities.name: Set 10 to store dynamic suffix filename
activities.description: is used to store the suffix filename for jira's RestApi

Query.defaultValue: select * from(    select rank () over( order by [key])  as RN, [Key] as IssueKey,'IssueHistory_'+ [Key] +'.json' as IssueFileName,'https://safefleet.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/issue/'+[Key]+'/changelog' as RestApi ,  'https://databistrg.blob.core.windows.net/test/'+'IssueHistory_'+ [Key] +'.json'+'?sp=racw&st=2023-06-29T06:17:16Z&se=2025-05-15T14:17:16Z&spr=https&sv=2022-11-02&sr=c&sig=%2B7kryfFPMVsgx4FvFpZ%2BRkMZ0Y9Q7ob9MfsTS745CP8%3D' as BlobRestApi, 'IssueHistory_'+ [Key] +'.csv' as IssueType_Sink_FileName   from Bug where Resolution_Date>='2023-01-01' and Resolution_Date<='2023-06-30' and Issue_Name in ('bug','improvement','story')    ) as A where RN >= 1 AND RN <= 10

select * from(    select rank () over( order by [key])  as RN, [Key] as IssueKey,'IssueHistory_'+ [Key] +'.json' as IssueFileName,'https://safefleet.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/issue/'+[Key]+'/changelog' as RestApi ,  'https://databistrg.blob.core.windows.net/test/'+'IssueHistory_'+ [Key] +'.json'+'?sp=racw&st=2023-06-29T06:17:16Z&se=2025-05-15T14:17:16Z&spr=https&sv=2022-11-02&sr=c&sig=%2B7kryfFPMVsgx4FvFpZ%2BRkMZ0Y9Q7ob9MfsTS745CP8%3D' as BlobRestApi, 'IssueHistory_'+ [Key] +'.csv' as IssueType_Sink_FileName   from Bug where Resolution_Date>='2023-01-01' and Resolution_Date<='2023-06-30' and Issue_Name in ('bug','improvement','story')    ) as A where RN >= 801 AND RN <= 1000
